title: Local Outlier Factor for Novelty Detection
description: In this lab, we will use the Local Outlier Factor (LOF) algorithm to perform novelty detection. LOF is an unsupervised anomaly detection method that identifies the local density deviation of a given data point with respect to its neighbors. It considers the samples that have a substantially lower density than their neighbors as outliers.
